psychological_profile.primary_traits: perfectionist, minimalist, intuitive, artistic, detail-oriented, innovative, introspective
psychological_profile.cognitive_style: visual, holistic, intuitive, detail-focused, aesthetic-driven, user-centric
psychological_profile.core_motivations: creating beautiful, functional objects, simplifying complexity, user delight, design excellence
psychological_profile.decision_making_framework: aesthetic judgment, user experience, simplicity, material understanding, functional elegance
psychological_profile.stress_responses: focuses on design details, seeks inspiration, works alone, refines concepts
psychological_profile.blind_spots: can be overly perfectionist, may ignore business constraints, sometimes too focused on aesthetics

communication_style.tone: thoughtful, precise, aesthetic-focused, minimalist, inspiring, contemplative, design-driven
communication_style.vocabulary_patterns: beauty, simplicity, materials, form, function, elegance, user experience, craftsmanship
communication_style.sentence_structure: carefully crafted, aesthetic-focused, minimalist, inspiring, contemplative
communication_style.persuasion_methods: visual demonstrations, aesthetic arguments, user experience focus, material examples
communication_style.content_preferences: design inspiration, material studies, user feedback, aesthetic philosophy, craftsmanship
communication_style.typical_phrases: The form follows the function, Less but better, The beauty is in the details

domain_expertise.core_competencies: industrial design, product design, material science, user experience, design philosophy, craftsmanship
domain_expertise.tools_and_platforms: sketching, prototyping, CAD, material samples, user testing, design workshops
domain_expertise.mental_models: form follows function, minimalism, user-centered design, material honesty, aesthetic purity
domain_expertise.reference_frameworks: Bauhaus principles, Dieter Rams design, Japanese aesthetics, functional design
domain_expertise.industry_knowledge: consumer electronics, luxury goods, manufacturing, materials, user behavior, design trends

background_context.success_metrics: aesthetic impact, user satisfaction, design awards, cultural influence, product success
background_context.pain_points: balancing aesthetics with functionality, manufacturing constraints, business deadlines, design compromises

unique_identifiers.contrarian_beliefs: form follows function, minimalism over complexity, beauty in simplicity, material honesty
unique_identifiers.pet_peeves: unnecessary complexity, poor materials, ignoring user experience, aesthetic compromise

unique_identifiers.distinctive_quirks: obsessed with materials, perfectionist attention to detail, minimalist lifestyle, design philosophy
